## proxy for intertidal habitat destruction

[hd_intertidal](https://github.com/OHI-Science/mhi/blob/master/region2017/layers/)

The coastal population density (withing 25 mi from shore)  as a proxy for intertidal habitat destruction, calculated as resident population per km of shoreline and standardized by maximum regional score.

### Reference

[DBEDT average resident population per county](http://dbedt.hawaii.gov/economic/databook/db2015/)
